column4: Please, can anyone help getting Ubuntu running on a G3? I am currently using it on a intel box and it worked fine but isn't with the g3.
G4 might help, tried the support forum but to no availe so far thogh.
i wonder if someone even continues to develope ubuntu ppc...
lol, I hope so, although it is 1998 hardware that I am working with.
i mean, now that apple doesnt use ppc anymore, will there be any new machines (for normal people) that uses ppc ?
